institution-wrap.institution: National Natural Science Foundation of China

funding-source.institution: International Program for Ph.D. Candidates, Sun Yat-Sen University, China

funding-group.funding-statement: The work was supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (grant No. 81373050, URLS: http://www.nsfc.gov.cn/, JL). The Municipal Healthcare Joint-Innovation Major Project of Guangzhou, China (grant No. 201604020011) and the Science and Technology Program of Guangzhou, China (grant No. 201508020062, URLs: http://www.gzsi.gov.cn/). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
